channel.title: Death problem with bows x.x
channel.description:
i get this error and server crashes and chars arent logged out x.x
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12 at client.PKz(client.java:20446) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20560) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20550) at client.process(client.java:14520) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:143) at server.main(server.java:50) [/code]
idk what it means, it ONLY happens with bows

item.title: Death problem with bows x.x
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:1, topic:130030”]i get this error and server crashes and chars arent logged out x.x

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12
        at client.PKz(client.java:20446)
        at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20560)
        at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20550)
        at client.process(client.java:14520)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:143)
        at server.main(server.java:50)

idk what it means, it ONLY happens with bows[/quote]

You’re trying to declare the array’s value at it’s highest index which you can’t do.

Read full topic

item.title: Death problem with bows x.x
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

watzupmeg:

bann bows lol simple as.

Wow.
U cant “ban” bows…
unlless u unpacked everyone of ur players cache and removed them.
Or removed range…

Follow the things that look like this
client.java:20446
and go to everyline and show me that line and ill be able to work something out (ctrl+g)
